DeathSteel::

He is moving too fast to stop as he had rushed on Kaiser.  He jumps 
up and flips over the kneeled bot. The blades graze his leg as he 
lifted off the ground.  He lands and turns to face Kaiser. He smiles. 
He waits for Kaiser to turn and face him. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He drops down to one knee allowing the blade to slash 
harmlessly over 
> his head.  Still kneeling he counters with a pair of thrusts at 
different 
> heights toward DeathSteel's abdomen.  He smiles inwardly as he 
glances up at 
> his opponent.
